tool_description: Cloud Hosting API and Domain Name Registration Service
name: Netcetera Beta
title: Netcetera Beta

api_list.name: /domains/whois
api_list.description: Check whether a Domain is available

required_parameters.name: domainname
required_parameters.description: The Domain Name you want to check

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://netcetera-netcetera-beta-v4.p.rapidapi.com/domains/whois/abc.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "netcetera-netcetera-beta-v4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://netcetera-netcetera-beta-v4.p.rapidapi.com/domains/whois/{domainname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "netcetera-netcetera-beta-v4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: say
api_list.description: Checks your Login details and replies with your text
